commits.summary: Explicitly request TM_ERROR_FD for stack trace/error output
commits.author: Allan Odgaard

commits.summary: Allow #!/usr/bin/osascript snippet to work in any document
commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body:
Limits the snippet to only work when the `osa` trigger is on the first line of a document.

Also add newline to end of snippet to match related snippets in other bundles.

commits.summary: Use the 'help' protocol instead of trying to keep track of where the help bundle is moved to. Fixes #2
commits.author: Blake Skinner

commits.summary: Fixed the path for the 'decompile_as' command
commits.author: Blake Skinner
